<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085946</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The math wars and the case for problem-centered math</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Mathekriege und das Argument für 
Problem-zentriertes Mathe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les guerres de maths et le point de droit pour des
maths problème-centrées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As guerras do math e o argumento para o math 
problema-centrado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le guerre di per la matematica e l'argomento per 
per la matematica problema-centrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πόλεμοι math και η περίπτωση για 
πρόβλημα-κεντροθετημένος math</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las guerras de la matemáticas y el caso para la 
matemáticas problema-centrada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Research shows that children harness the power of mathematics when they devise their own procedures for solving problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung zeigt, daß Kinder die Energie von 
Mathematik vorspannen, wenn sie ihre eigenen Prozeduren für das 
Lösen von von Problemen planen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La recherche prouve que les enfants arment la 
puissance des mathématiques quand ils conçoivent leurs propres 
procédures pour résoudre des problèmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pesquisa mostra que as crianças aproveitaram a 
potência da matemática quando planejam seus próprios procedimentos 
para resolver problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La ricerca indica che i bambini sfruttano 
l'potenza della matematica quando redigono le loro proprie procedure 
per risolvere i problemi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έρευνα δείχνει ότι τα παιδιά εκμεταλλεύονται τη 
δύναμη των μαθηματικών όταν επινοούν τις διαδικασίες τους για τα 
προβλήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La investigación muestra que los niños enjaezan 
la potencia de las matemáticas cuando idean sus propios 
procedimientos para solucionar problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

        </lifeCycle>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
